class.name: jsx3.amp.util.PrefsPane
class.text: A pane in a preferences panel. Provided by the jsx3.amp.util.prefspanel plug-in.

field.name: SAVED
field.text: Event subject published when a preference pane is saved.

field.name: DIRTIED
field.text: Event subject published when the state of a preference pane is dirtied.

constructor.name: init

param.name: ext
param.text: the AMP extension declaring this pane.

param.name: obj
param.text: the XML declaration of the extension.

constructor.text:
The instance initializer. The obj parameter must define an attribute, resource, which is the name of an XML resource of ext. This resource will be loaded as the UI component of this pane. The root object of this component file may define the following methods:
getFirstResponder() : jsx3.app.Model — returns the object that should be focused when the pane is revealed.
loadPrefs() : void — restores the state of the pane before it is revealed.
savePrefs() : void | Object{title, message} — saves the state of the pane and optionally returns a title and message to be shown in an alert dialog.

method.name: getTitle
method.text: Returns the title of this pane.

method.name: getDescription
method.text: Returns the description of this pane.

method.name: getImage
method.text: Returns the resolved path of the image of this pane.

method.name: getUI
method.text: Returns the root component of this pane once it is rendered.

method.name: getFirstResponder
method.text: Returns the object in the UI of this pane that should get focus when this pane is first revealed. This method delegates to the method getFirstResponder() of the root UI component for this pane, if that method is defined.

method.name: setDirty
method.text: Sets whether this pane has unsaved changes.

method.name: isDirty
method.text: Returns whether this pane has unsaved changes.

method.name: save
method.text: Saves the state of this pane. This method delegates to the savePrefs() method of the root UI component of this pane.

method.name: getProperty
method.text: Returns an arbitrary property of this pane.

method.name: setProperty
method.text: Sets an arbitrary property of this pane. This method may be used for saving state.
